channel.title: Android Artefacts on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Android Artefacts on Analyst

item.title: Backups
item.description: Backups are either made automatically or manually with adb backup. These backups can be stored in the cloud or locally on the user’s PC.

item.title: Geo
item.description: /data/data/com.google.android.apps.maps/databases/gmm_storage.db # User Photos /data/media/0/DCIM/Camera /data/data/com.androidproviders.media/databases/external.db /data/media/0/bluetooth /data/media/0/Download /data/media/0/Pictures/Screenshots /data/media/0/Pictures/Twitter References Expand… Something here

item.title: RAM
item.description: For mobile platforms (iOS and Android) there is currently no tool available to get a full copy of RAM.
